item.title: Stocks: 5 things to know before the open
item.description: Here's what you need to know about the markets before you start your business day.
item.ExtractedText: Related: Russia slides into deeper recession 3. Earnings updates: There are a few company results to watch out for today, starting with earnings from Estee Lauder ( EL ) before the market open. Urban Outfitters ( URBN ) will report this afternoon. 4. International markets: It was a mixed session across global markets. In Europe , Germany's DAX rose 0.4% while the U.K.'s FTSE index inched down 0.1%. Over to Asia , China's Shanghai Composite closed up 0.7% and the yuan was steady against the U.S. dollar. The stabilization in the Chinese currency helped restore some calm to trading after a surprise devaluation sparked a sell-off on global markets last week. Related: Why did China crash the yuan? Japan's economic recovery hit another stumbling block as data showed GDP contracted in the second quarter. The country's benchmark Nikkei index added 0.4%. Hong Kong's Hang Seng closed down 0.7%. 5. Friday market recap: It was a positive end to the week for U.S. investors. The Dow Jones industrial average and the S&P 500 each put on 0.4%, while the Nasdaq added 0.3%. CNNMoney (London) First published August 17, 2015: 5:41 AM ET
